name: Shortlist Notification
subject: Congratulations! You have been shortlisted
body:
Dear {{candidate_name}},

We are happy to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the next round of interviews for the {{job_title}} position.

Our team will contact you shortly with further details.

Best regards,

name: Rejection Email
subject: Update on your application for {{job_title}}
body:
Dear {{candidate_name}},

Thank you for your interest in the {{job_title}} position.

After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we will not be proceeding with your application at this time.

We wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

Best regards,
Recruitment Team
